scene_prompt: A warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration of a sunny garden with a small, ripe red tomato on a green vine. A tiny pair of child's hands gently touching the tomato, surrounded by soft grass and flowers. Soft pastel colors, simple shapes, no text, picture book style.

A warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration of a cheerful grandfather holding a bright red tomato in a sunlit garden. A small child looks up in wonder, surrounded by green tomato plants and a wooden fence. Soft pastel colors, simple shapes, no text, picture book style.

A warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration of a grandfather and a small child smiling while gently picking ripe red tomatoes together in a sunny garden. Soft pastel colors, simple shapes, no text, picture book style.

A warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration of a smiling grandma and grandpa in a cozy kitchen, holding fresh red tomatoes and a pot, with soft steam rising as if cooking curry. Pastel yellows, greens, and reds, simple shapes, picture book style.
